name: IntercomSwap VibeTrader
description: An automated trading agent that executes swaps on IntercomSwap based on social sentiment and liquidity metrics.
instructions: 1. Monitor target tokens on the Trac Network for sudden spikes in positive sentiment.
2. If the vibe score exceeds 0.85, query IntercomSwap for the deepest liquidity pool.
3. Execute the swap transaction ensuring slippage does not exceed 1%.
4. Report the transaction hash back to the user interface.
